mapper.insert: INSERT INTO at_company_judge (id, email, name, company_type, busi_num, certi_num, create_date, sns) VALUES ( company_judge_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{name}, #{comType}, #{busiNum}, #{certiNum}, #{createDate}, #{sns} )
mapper.select: SELECT email, name, t.title as "comType", busi_num as "busiNum", c.title as "certiNum", create_date as "createDate", sns FROM at_company_judge j, at_company_type t, at_company_certi c WHERE J.company_type = T.id AND J.certi_num = C.id AND j.email = #{value}
SELECT email, name, t.title, busi_num, c.title, create_date, sns FROM at_company_judge j, at_company_type t, at_company_certi c WHERE J.company_type = T.id AND J.certi_num = C.id;
mapper.update: UPDATE at_company_judge SET category_id = #{categoryId}, base_fund = #{baseFund}, fund_history = #{fundHistory}, first_fund = #{firstFund}, first_date = #{firstDate}, hasPatent = #{hasPatent}, ceo_tel = #{ceoTel}, file_busi_registration = #{fileBusiRegistration}, file_comp_certification = #{fileCompCertification}, file_patent_certification =#{filePatentCertification}, file_invest_certification = #{fileInvestCertification} WHERE email = #{email}
